entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Smiths Falls
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 8:43 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 0.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Kemptville 12:00 AM EST Friday 10 February 2023
Temperature: 0.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.1 kPa falling
Humidity: 99 %
Dewpoint: 0.7°C
Wind: ESE 8 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Showers. Temperature rising to plus 5 by morning.
entry.summary: Freezing rain mixed with ice pellets and rain changing to a few rain showers this evening. Fog patches developing this evening and dissipating overnight. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming southwest 30 after midnight. Temperature rising to plus 5 by morning. Forecast issued 6:30 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of showers. Temperature falling to plus 2 in the morning then steady. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Wind southwest 30 km/h becoming light in the morning. Temperature falling to plus 2 in the morning then steady. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 6:30 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Flurries. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the evening. A few flurries beginning early in the evening and ending after midnight. Local amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 6:30 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023
